page.title: 03NEWS FROM THE PENARTH TIMES.
page.content: In June,the local paper reported on a plan to build a{supermarket}in Lower Penarth opposite{Cosmeston} Park.Local {Chamber of Trade}objected to adverse effects on small shops and increase in volume of traffic.The{superstore}plan was opposed by the Vale Council and local residents.A readers letter shows concern about traffic speed,Lavernock Road and suggests a pedestrian bridge. Few letters claim that Penarth is not sufficiently{signposted on the M4,}and no signs from the town centre to Cliff Walk and Lavernock.Reports of planning consent for{14 elderly persons' homes and a community hall in Lower Penarth. Council policy of{pollarding old trees in Archer and Cwrt_y_vil roads is too expensive and will be replaced by new young trees.Police warning_Car thefts.
